metadata.dc:author: Planas-Giron, G
Toni Alvarez, M
Perez Alfonzo, R
metadata.dc:description: A case of a 72 year-old woman, with a verrucous lesion was presented. The lesion was characterized by a purple colour and measured 2 X 1.5 cm. in diameter. The patient had the lesion for 1 year and reported previous repetitive traumas, suggesting a clinical diagnosis of traumatic seborrheic keratosis. The histological study reveal a clear cell acanthoma.
metadata.dc:title: Acantoma de células claras. Presentación de un caso.
[Clear cell acanthoma. Presentation of a case].
